video.title: Dates - Beau teaches JavaScript
video.description:
Work with dates in JavaScript.

💻 Video with editable code: https://scrimba.com/casts/coab2-08cb15b8a093

🐦 Beau Carnes on Twitter: https://twitter.com/carnesbeau

topLevelComment.text: I have 3 year . i have to add check that is my date gonna lie in 3 years if yes show overlap message otherwise i can enter the date . Do u have any example please share the link. It would be great full . thanks in advance

topLevelComment.author: Alfredo Eduardo Valdés Matta
topLevelComment.text: This instruction video should end with the usage of locale.  I18N is needed at this level.
